content.question: Let f be the function given by <math> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> <mo>âˆ’</mo> <mn>3</mn> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </math>. What are all values of c that satisfy the conclusion of the Mean Value Theorem of differential calculus on the closed interval [0,3]?

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
